Class TicketMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicketMaster

  • public class TicketMaster
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Company company 
      (package private) static java.util.Scanner scan
      The Ticketmaster is a central class acting as the interface towards customers and channelling information to a company.

      TicketMaster(Company company) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Flight getAndPresentDestinations()
      A method that catch the available flights that can be booked from the company that the Ticketmaster object is initialised with.
      private Ticket getAndReserveSeat(java.lang.String name, Flight flight)
      This method uses the flight to locate free seats (of both economy and First class) on the chosen flight and presents them to the customer to chose.
      private int getPrice(Ticket newTicket)
      A method to calculate price of a ticket created in earlier steps.
      void start()
      This is the source of ticket instances and could be called from different sources into different threads (thread safe not implemented yet).
      private void TheFoodService(Ticket newTicket)
      In this method food is chosen and added to an existing ticket.
      private void ticketChanger(int ticketNumber)
      This method allows the user to change certain aspects of an existing ticket (and displays the extra charge/reimbursement.

    • Field Detail

      • scan

        static java.util.Scanner scan
        The Ticketmaster is a central class acting as the interface towards customers and channelling information to a company. It can be instantiated by different companies and by different customers (thread safe not implemented). It is a command line interface.

      • company

        Company company

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicketMaster

        public TicketMaster(Company company)

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        This is the source of ticket instances and could be called from different sources into different threads (thread safe not implemented yet). Care is taken to curate input and and option of change an existing ticket is given.

      • ticketChanger

        private void ticketChanger(int ticketNumber)
        This method allows the user to change certain aspects of an existing ticket (and displays the extra charge/reimbursement.
        Parameters:
        ticketNumber -

      • getAndPresentDestinations

        private Flight getAndPresentDestinations()
        A method that catch the available flights that can be booked from the company that the Ticketmaster object is initialised with.

      • getAndReserveSeat

        private Ticket getAndReserveSeat(java.lang.String name,
                                 Flight flight)
        This method uses the flight to locate free seats (of both economy and First class) on the chosen flight and presents them to the customer to chose.
        Parameters:
        name - The customers name
        flight - A flight must be chosen either as a new customer or from an existing ticket.
        Returns:
        Returns an ticket to be further processed (food) already registered in the company database.

      • TheFoodService

        private void TheFoodService(Ticket newTicket)
        In this method food is chosen and added to an existing ticket. An arbitrary price limit is set to divide the food choices between First classs and Economy class.
        Parameters:
        newTicket - An existing ticket is required to process.

      • getPrice

        private int getPrice(Ticket newTicket)
        A method to calculate price of a ticket created in earlier steps.
        Parameters:
        newTicket -
        Returns:
